name: df-psubsp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cpsubsp, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), cfv(catm, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s4), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s4), cv(s1))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ PSubSp =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 |(s1 ‚äÜ(Atoms ` s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0),(s4[(le ` s0)](s2[(join ` s0)]s3)‚Üí s4 ‚àà s1)))))})
comment: Define set of all projective subspaces. Based on definition of subspace in [Holland95] p. 212. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2011.)
